member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Common.CImage.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose the object.

remarks.para: Frees unmanaged resources used by the object. The object becomes unusable after that.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Common.CImage.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Dispose the object.
member.param: Indicates if disposing was initiated manually.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Common.ImageOperator.Clone(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Clone image.
member.param: Source image.
member.returns: Return clone of the source image.
member.remarks: The original Bitmap.Clone() does not produce the desired result - it does not create an actual clone (it does not create a copy of the image). That is why this method was implemented to provide the functionality.

member.name: T:Dynamsoft.Common.Util
member.summary: Summary description for Util.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Common.Util.Clone(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Clone image.
member.param: Source image.
member.returns: Return clone of the source image.
member.remarks: The original Bitmap.Clone() does not produce the desired result - it does not create an actual clone (it does not create a copy of the image). That is why this method was implemented to provide the functionality.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Common.Util.Clone(System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData)
member.summary: Clone image.
member.param: Source image data.
member.returns: Clones image from source image data. The message does not clone pallete in the case if the source image has indexed pixel format.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Common.Util.CopyUnmanagedMemory(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copy block of unmanaged memory.
member.param: Destination pointer.
Source pointer.
Memory block's length to copy.
member.returns: Return's value of - pointer to destination.

remarks.para: This function is required because of the fact that .NET does not provide any way to copy unmanaged blocks, but provides only methods to copy from unmanaged memory to managed memory and vise versa.

member.name: T:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.ResultFormat
member.summary: Supported OCR output format.

member.summary: PDF plain text.

member.summary: PDF image over text.

member.name: T:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode
member.summary: Possible modes for page layout analysis.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_OSD_ONLY
member.summary: Orientation and script detection only.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_AUTO_OSD
member.summary: Automatic page segmentation with orientation and script detection. (OSD)

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_AUTO_ONLY
member.summary: Automatic page segmentation, but no OSD, or OCR.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_AUTO
member.summary: Fully automatic page segmentation, but no OSD. (Default)

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_SINGLE_COLUMN
member.summary: Assume a single column of text of variable sizes.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_SINGLE_BLOCK_VERT_TEXT
member.summary: Assume a single uniform block of vertically aligned text.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_SINGLE_BLOCK
member.summary: Assume a single uniform block of text.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_SINGLE_LINE
member.summary: Treat the image as a single text line.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_SINGLE_WORD
member.summary: Treat the image as a single word.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_CIRCLE_WORD
member.summary: Treat the image as a single word in a circle.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.OCR.Enums.PageSetMode.PSM_SINGLE_CHAR
member.summary: Treat the image as a single character.

member.name: T:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract
member.summary: Defines a class provides functions for recognizing text.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.GetResultPageSetCount
member.summary: Returns how many pagesets there are in the OCR result.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.GetResultPageCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the number of pages that are recognized in a specified pageset.
member.param: Specifies the index of the selected pageset.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.GetResultLineCount(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns how many lines there are in the OCR result for a specified page in a pageset.
member.param: Specifies the index of the selected pageset.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.GetResultWordsCount(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns how many words there are in a specified line in a specified page of a pageset.
member.param: Specifies the index of the selected pageset.
Specifies the index of the page in the pageset.
Specifies the index of the line in the page.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.GetResultLineRect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the coordinates for the rectangle that contains a specified line in a specified page of a pageset.
member.param: Specifies the index of the selected pageset.
Specifies the index of the page in the pageset.
Specifies the index of the line in the page.
member.returns: The string in the format of "left,top,right,bottom". For example:"12,25,200,50".
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.GetResultWordsRect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the coordinates for the rectangle that contains a specified word.
member.param: Specifies the index of the selected pageset.
Specifies the index of the page in the pageset.
Specifies the index of the line in the page.
Specifies the index of the word in the line.
member.returns: The string in the format of "left,top,right,bottom". For example:"12,25,200,50".
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.GetResultWordsFontSize(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the font size of a specified word in the OCR result.
member.param: Specifies the index of the selected pageset.
Specifies the index of the page in the pageset.
Specifies the index of the line in the page.
Specifies the index of the word in the line.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.GetResultWordsFontName(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the font name of a specified word in the OCR result.
member.param: Specifies the index of the selected pageset.
Specifies the index of the page in the pageset.
Specifies the index of the line in the page.
Specifies the index of the word in the line.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initialize the component with features to do OCR.
member.param: Specifies the license.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.GetRseultWordsText(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the text of a specified word in the OCR result.
member.param: Specifies the index of the selected pageset.
Specifies the index of the page in the pageset.
Specifies the index of the line in the page.
Specifies the index of the word in the line.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.Recognize(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Does OCR with the bitmap of the images and return PDF stream or ASCII string.
member.param: Specifies the bitmap of images in buffer.
member.returns: Non-NULL indicates success. NULL indicates failure. Returned format is specified by ResultFormat.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.Recognize(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Does zonal OCR with a list of the images and return PDF stream or ASCII string.
member.param: Specifies the bitmap of images in buffer.
Specifies the left edge of the OCR rectangle.
Specifies the top edge of the OCR rectangle.
Specifies the right edge of the OCR rectangle.
Specifies the bottom edge of the OCR rectangle.
member.returns: Non-NULL indicates success. NULL indicates failure. Returned format is specified by ResultFormat.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.Recognize(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Drawing.Bitmap})
member.summary: Does OCR with a list of the images and return PDF stream or ASCII string.
member.param: Specifies the list of images in buffer. The format is bitmap.
member.returns: Non-NULL indicates success. NULL indicates failure. Returned format is specified by ResultFormat.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.Recognize(System.String[])
member.summary: Does OCR with the image of a specified filenames.
member.param: Specifies the the image with a specified filenames.
member.returns: Non-NULL indicates success. NULL indicates failure. Returned format is specified by ResultFormat property.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.UnicodeFontName
member.summary: Returns or sets the unicode font name used in PDF file. For example, "Arial", "ArialUni".
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.UseDetectedFont
member.summary: Returns or sets whether use the detected font.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.TessDataPath
member.summary: Returns or sets the tessdata path. The datapath must be the name of the parent directory of tessdata and must be ended with '/' . Any words after the last '/' will be stripped.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.Language
member.summary: Returns or sets the language string. The language is (usually) an ISO 639-3 string, the default value is "eng".
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.PageSetMode
member.summary: Returns or sets the possible modes for page layout analysis.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.ResultFormat
member.summary: Returns or sets the OCR output format.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.NumericOnly
member.summary: Returns or sets whether to get the result in numbers only.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.OCR.Tesseract.PdfFontSize
member.summary: Returns or sets the size for the PDF font.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check OCRException.
